short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for reporting and ticket creation on SWEVEN - The #1 Solution for Work Distribution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SWEVEN Screen Capture is a Google Chrome extension that allows users to easily report issues or create tasks by capturing screenshots. This tool enables users to add annotations, such as text, lines, arrows, circles, or squares, to the captured screenshot. With SWEVEN Screen Capture, users can easily communicate their feedback or tasks to others, making it a useful tool for teams collaborating on projects.
